com.ibm.db2.r2dbc

Class DB2ConnectionPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.db2.r2dbc.DB2ConnectionPool

  • public class DB2ConnectionPool
extends Object
    A connection pool for DB2Connections. The maximum number of connections pooled is configured by the "conPoolSize" property in DB2ConnectionConfiguration. The maximum number of prepared statements cached is determined by "stmtCacheSize" property.
    See Also:
    DB2Connection

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DB2ConnectionPool(DB2ConnectionFactory factory)
      Constructs a DB2ConnectionPool which uses the supplied DB2ConnectionFactory to create {code DB2Connection} instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void> closeAll()
      Closes all the database connections in the pool.
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<DB2Connection> getConnection()
      Gets a free DB2Connection from the pool.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • DB2ConnectionPool

        public DB2ConnectionPool(DB2ConnectionFactory factory)
        Constructs a DB2ConnectionPool which uses the supplied DB2ConnectionFactory to create {code DB2Connection} instances.
        Parameters:
        factory - reference to a DB2ConnectionFactory

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<DB2Connection> getConnection()
        Gets a free DB2Connection from the pool. When no free connections are available the Mono waits. When a connection is released, the Mono completes with the available connection.
        Returns:
        Mono<DB2Connection>

      • closeAll

        public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void> closeAll()
        Closes all the database connections in the pool.
        Returns:
        indicates the completion status.
